plan_context.query: The user says PRODUCT_INFO. Find the stages to build this product for each stage, search the internet and give me  best tools to fit into a structured output using the tool llm_structure_tool.

steps.task: Based on the request PRODUCT_INFO, outline the 5 stages for the software development of this product. The stages should be limited to programing, UI design and fields closely related to tech only. Each stage should be a clear, single sentence, structured as a list of strings. Keep the total response under 150 words.

inputs.name: $product_info
inputs.description: Details of the product to build based on the input information.

steps.task: Search for only one real software fitting for each stage. Find only 1 tool for each stage, 5 stages in total. Do no make things up. Limit the tool to tool name, short description in one sentence, website link, and the link to the product logo image

inputs.name: $stage
inputs.description: The stages to build the product.

steps.task: Organize the identified tools into a structured output.

inputs.name: $tools_for_five_stages
inputs.description: The tools identified for the five stages.
